remarks.format: ## Remarks 緩衝區是用來快取資料，以減少對作業系統的記憶體中的位元組區塊。A buffer is a block of bytes in memory used to cache data, thereby reducing the number of calls to the operating system. 緩衝區改善讀取和寫入的效能。Buffers improve read and write performance. 緩衝區可以同時使用的其中一種讀取或寫入，但永遠不會兩者。A buffer can be used for either reading or writing, but never both simultaneously. 和方法`BufferedStream`自動維護緩衝區。The and methods of `BufferedStream` automatically maintain the buffer. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. `BufferedStream` 可以是特定類型的資料流周圍組成。`BufferedStream` can be composed around certain types of streams. 它提供讀取和寫入位元組至基礎資料來源或儲存機制的實作。It provides implementations for reading and writing bytes to an underlying data source or repository. 使用和進行讀取和寫入其他資料型別。Use and for reading and writing other data types. `BufferedStream` 被為了防止不需要緩衝區時，降低輸入和輸出緩衝區。`BufferedStream` is designed to prevent the buffer from slowing down input and output when the buffer is not needed. 如果您將其一律的讀取和寫入的大小大於內部緩衝區大小，然後`BufferedStream`甚至不可能會配置內部緩衝區。If you always read and write for sizes greater than the internal buffer size, then `BufferedStream` might not even allocate the internal buffer. `BufferedStream` 也緩衝讀取及寫入的共用緩衝區。`BufferedStream` also buffers reads and writes in a shared buffer. 它會假設您將幾乎一律是 執行一系列的讀取或寫入，但很少兩者之間輪替。It is assumed that you will almost always be doing a series of reads or writes, but rarely alternate between the two of them. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用`BufferedStream`類別透過`NetworkStream`類別來增進特定 I/O 作業的效能。The following code examples show how to use the `BufferedStream` class over the `NetworkStream` class to increase the performance of certain I/O operations. 啟動遠端電腦上的伺服器，然後再啟動用戶端。Start the server on a remote computer before starting the client. 啟動用戶端時，指定遠端電腦名稱做為命令列引數。Specify the remote computer name as a command-line argument when starting the client. 改變`dataArraySize`和`streamBufferSize`常數來檢視它們對效能的影響。Vary the `dataArraySize` and `streamBufferSize` constants to view their effect on performance. 第一個範例顯示在用戶端執行的程式碼和第二個範例顯示在伺服器執行的程式碼。The first example shows the code that runs on the client, and the second example shows the code that runs on the server. **範例 1: 用戶端執行的程式碼****Example 1: Code that runs on the client** [!code-cpp[System.IO.BufferedStream1#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream1/CPP/client.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BufferedStream1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream1/CS/client.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BufferedStream1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream1/VB/client.vb#1)] **範例 2： 在伺服器執行的程式碼****Example 2: Code that runs on the server** [!code-cpp[System.IO.BufferedStream2#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream2/CPP/server.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.IO.BufferedStream2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream2/CS/server.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.BufferedStream2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.IO.BufferedStream2/VB/server.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 清除資料流不會清除其基礎的編碼器，除非您明確地呼叫`Flush`或。Flushing the stream will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Flush` or . 如果您使用建構函式，因此在建立時指定的緩衝區大小`BufferedStream`物件內容時達到其大小的緩衝區排清。If you use the constructor, thus specifying the buffer size while creating the `BufferedStream` object, the content is flushed when it reaches the buffer size. 例如，程式碼如`BufferedStream bs = new BufferedStream(bs, 5)`緩衝區大小到達 5 個位元組時，會清除內容。For example, code such as `BufferedStream bs = new BufferedStream(bs, 5)` will flush the content when the buffer size reaches 5 bytes. 所有的讀取和寫入方法`BufferedStream`自動維護緩衝區，因此不需要叫用`Flush`時讀取和寫入之間來回切換。All the read and write methods of `BufferedStream` automatically maintain the buffer, so there is no need to invoke `Flush` when switching back and forth between reading and writing. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class.
